examples: I like to drink beer with my friends.
He ordered a cold beer at the bar.
Eu gosto de beber cerveja com meus amigos.
Ele pediu uma cerveja gelada no bar.

suggested: Here's to the weekend and cracking open a cold beer with friends!
Nothing gets the party started like a round of ice-cold beers.
There's nothing like a cold beer after a long day to help you unwind.
Beer is a staple of many cultures around the world and has been enjoyed for centuries.
There's a beer for every palate, from light and refreshing to rich and complex.
Beer is a versatile drink that pairs well with many different foods, from burgers to sushi.
Craft beer has exploded in popularity in recent years, with small breweries offering unique and flavorful brews.
